UPNW - Train #614 Moving

Train 614, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 7:02 a.m., may be operating 40 minutes behind schedule due to a mechanical failure on train #612.  Some trains may be operating out of sequence due to this delay.  Updated at 6:12 a.m.

ME The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.
The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW Delays and Operational Changes

Some UPNW trains may be delayed and operating out of sequence due to an earlier mechanical failure on train #612. For your safety, please stand behind the yellow line until your train comes to a complete stop. Visit metratracker.com.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW #622 On The Move
Train #622, scheduled to depart Harvard at 6:00 a.m., is on the move delayed 28 to 33 minutes due to an earlier mechanical failure on train 612. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW - Train #612 Will Not Operate - Trains #614, #616, and #618 Accommodating (UPDATE)

Train #612, scheduled to depart Crystal Lake at 5:45 a.m., will not operate due to mechanical problems. Trains #614, #616, and #618 will accommodate passengers. Please visit metratracker.com for the location and delay times of your train. -Updated at 6:22a

The Van Buren Station Platform elevator is back in service.

MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
